attributes.review: I am actually disgusted by the content in this app. it’s clear that the president does not care about the well being of americans (republicans, democrats, and liberals alike).

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to just write a bad review :) please do not vote for this racist, homophobic, sexist, etc. cheeto. He doesn’t not deserve to run this country. Thank you.

attributes.review: I got this app to educate myself on trumps plans for the following presidential election. After careful evaluation, I have decided that he is not getting my vote. 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️😜😜😜😍😍

attributes.review: honestly a terrible app. like he’s the president, he should have better app designers to make a smoother running and and aesthetically pleasing app. still can’t believe this orange cheeto is our president, can’t wait till he’s gone! just a reminder that if you support him you support white supremacy!! much love xx
